room.name: The Fraternities front door
room.short_description:
You're on the doorstep to most wild fraternity on campus. It's 10 AM and the yard is a battlezone. 
You are greeted by Chad Chadington the third asking "Who do you know here".
room.long_description:
The front door is a very welcoming place, almost familiar but it looks entirely different in the daylight.
 I suppose theres only one way to go if you hope to get your lost phone back. I seem to remember something about the home gym.

room.name: The Front Entrance
room.short_description: You have entered in tThere is stair case leading to the basement
room.long_description: The Front entrance shoe rack is filled with Sperrys

room.name: The DJ Booth
room.short_description: It's 10 AM and all you can wonder is why pitbull is already playing
room.long_description: we at that hotel motel holiday inn, we at that hotel motel holiday inn

room.name: BRO GYM
room.short_description: These athletes must be in top physical shape for when the summer intermural sports season begins
room.long_description:
Man buns, curls in the squat rack and a good hydration beer like natty lites is the key to get on 
board tha gains train, it's backed by science

room.name: Man Cave
room.long_description:
Consists of two flatscreen TVs because reading is for chumps and large sound system to drown the 
sounds from the pledging room

room.name: The pledging room
room.short_description: This is where boys become men
room.long_description: Dont stay here too long you, you dont want to think about this room too much

item.name: salmon colored shorts
item.desc: A nice pair of salmon colored shorts. You know that theres a matching hawaiian shirt or white polo somewhere in the house

item.name: barstool sports poster
item.desc: Not a poster, but a flag that this fraternity is patriotic too

item.name: baggy of oregano
item.desc: Blend of herbs and spices, someone got ripped off

item.name: pink garden flamingo
item.desc: Not quite what you were looking for, But it really adds to the aesthetic to the house

item.name: your Cell phone
item.desc:
Clearly your phone has gone on a wild adventure without you because you cant get sign but there is evidence leading from 
your new background to who may be able to sign you in
